content.rendered: Currently the executive chairman of DX (Group) plc and Braemar Shipping Services plc. Ron previously was the senior independent director of Clipper Logistics plc and held senior management positions at Lonmin plc, the platinum group metals producer, Viridian Group Limited, the energy company, and Dubai World, the global investment company.

jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: James is a chartered accountant Chartered Accountant and CEO of Braemar Shipping Services PLC. Former Finance Director at Boosey & Hawkes Music Publishers Limited and Group Financial Controller of Carlton Communications PLC. Finance Director of Braemar Shipping Services plc from 2002 until his appointment as Chief Executive in June 2012.
